backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining chatroom, message, user profile, and reaction data structures with CRUD operations, access control integration, blob storage mixin, and HTTP outcall support.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three implemented features: removing separate X/video input fields, detecting and previewing links inline, and extracting URLs for storage in message metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend components, pages, hooks, and configuration files describing UI structure, state management, styling, and user interactions.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with cache-busting meta tags, viewport configuration for mobile, and versioned script tag to force production refresh.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component with TanStack Router setup defining lobby, chatroom, and admin routes, conditional header/footer rendering, theme provider, and 404 handling.
frontend/src/components/AvatarPickerDial: Dialog component for avatar selection supporting file upload, Giphy search with debouncing, trending GIFs, and avatar removal with localStorage-based state management.
frontend/src/components/ChatArea.tsx: Main chat interface with collapsible header, pinned video area, scrollable message list with auto-scroll, reply context handling, message filtering (hiding Creator messages without media), and category badge display.
frontend/src/components/ChatroomCard.tsx: Displays a chatroom card with thumbnail previews for YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter media, showing live status, participant count, and message count. Fetches platform-specific thumbnails and Twitter oEmbed previews on mount.
frontend/src/components/CreateChatroomDi: Modal dialog for creating chatrooms with topic, description, category, and media options (image upload, YouTube/Twitch video URLs, or Twitter posts). Validates video URLs, handles image uploads with progress tracking, and renders Twitter embed previews.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component displaying copyright notice and attribution link to caffeine.ai with a heart icon.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Application header with logo, username editing functionality, avatar picker button, and back-to-lobby navigation for chatroom views. Manages inline username editing with character limit and validation.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Intentional no-op placeholder component that renders nothing, ensuring the app remains anonymous without authentication requirements.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Renders individual chat messages with avatar, timestamp, reactions, and media embeds (YouTube, Twitch, Twitter, voice messages). Supports pinning/unpinning videos, adding/removing emoji reactions, and replying to messages with scroll-to functionality.
frontend/src/components/MessageInput.tsx: Chat input component with text message support, voice recording with timer, and automatic link detection for preview. Handles audio recording via MediaRecorder API, uploads audio to blob storage, and enforces 2000 character limit.
frontend/src/components/MessageInputLink: Displays preview cards for YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter/X links detected in message input, fetching Twitter oEmbed data and showing thumbnails with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/PinnedVideo.tsx: Renders a pinned YouTube or Twitch video with an embedded iframe player and an unpin button, extracting video IDs and generating appropriate embed URLs.
frontend/src/components/VoiceMessagePlay: Audio player component with play/pause controls, waveform visualization, progress slider, and time display, handling playback synchronization across multiple audio elements.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance with authentication, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Custom hook that returns a debounced version of a value, delaying updates by a specified delay (default 300ms).
Hook that extracts and identifies the first YouTube, Twitch, or Twitter/X URL from text input using regex pattern matching.
frontend/src/hooks/useForceFreshChatroom: Hook that purges stale chatroom cache entries and forces a fresh refetch when the actor becomes ready, preventing persisted empty arrays from blocking lobby display on initial page load.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flow, identity persistence, and delegation validation using DFINITY's AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for chatroom operations (fetching, creating, joining, messaging) and user profile management, plus an image upload helper that compresses and stores images in localStorage with blob-storage prefixes.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, mobile-specific input styles to prevent zoom on iOS, and custom styling for voice message range inputs.
frontend/src/lib/config.ts: Exports frontend configuration constants for Giphy API integration (API key and result limit).
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Provides a utility function to format numbers with compact notation (k, M, B) for display purposes.
frontend/src/lib/giphy.ts: Implements Giphy API integration for searching and fetching trending GIFs, returning structured GIF data with preview and original URLs.
frontend/src/lib/html2canvasLoader.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for html2canvas dynamic import logic.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Client-side image compression utility that resizes and recompresses images using canvas while preserving orientation, with configurable quality and dimension limits.
frontend/src/lib/twitterEmbedRenderer.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for Twitter embed rendering logic.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreview.ts: Fetches Twitter oEmbed JSON data and extracts safe preview fields (author, text, image) without DOM manipulation, with caching and request deduplication.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreviewCac: Manages localStorage caching for Twitter oEmbed preview data with validation, expiration (7 days), and versioning support.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnail.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for Twitter thumbnail generation logic.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnailCache.t: Empty file, likely a placeholder for Twitter thumbnail caching logic.
frontend/src/lib/urlExtractor.ts: Extracts the first supported URL (YouTube, Twitch, or Twitter) from text strings using regex, returning the URL and its type.
frontend/src/lib/videoUtils.ts: Utility functions for extracting video IDs and generating thumbnail/embed URLs for YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter/X content from various URL formats.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDeleteChatroomsP: Admin page with password authentication that displays a filterable table of chatrooms with delete functionality.
frontend/src/pages/ChatroomPage.tsx: Chatroom detail page that loads a specific chatroom by ID, increments view count on mount, and renders the ChatArea component with error and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Main lobby page displaying a searchable and filterable grid of chatroom cards with category badges, create dialog, and client-side filtering logic.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color system, extended theme values for UI components, and animation keyframes for accordions.
project_state.json: Project state tracking document describing the chat application's architecture, existing features for inline link embedding (X posts, YouTube/Twitch), and pending feature requests.
